name: The Mysterious Island (itch) (Septillion)
description:
The Mysterious Island

You are an explorer that just landed on a mysterious island! Can you collect all of the scrolls in each of the island's areas?

A 3D Game Project that I created for one of my university courses. There is a large hub and a number of smaller areas, each filled with scrolls and gems for you to collect.

If you're lagging, there is a PC build of the game in the downloads section that may be faster than in a browser. For a list of credits/sources, see Credits.txt.
